person.note: Fan(2) Chunren [559] Posthumously purged as Yuanyou coalition member. His ancestors were Gaoping jun Fan(2). Fan(2) Zhongyan's [8043] son, Zhongwen's [7214] nephew, Chunli's [560] and Chuncui's [561] brother, Zhengguo's [565] and Zhengping's [7212] father, Wang(2) Zhi(1)'s [7079] son-in-law, and husband of Wang(2) Dan's [8153] grandniece. Father-in-law of Zhou(1) E [7194], Zhuang(1) Gongyue [546], Sima(1) Hong [7063], Guo(1) Zhongxiao [7036], and Cui(1) Baosun [7070] and Cai(1) Ting's [1661] son, Gu [3862]. Chunren was Wang(2) Su's [1881] cousin-in-law, Yin(2) Gou's [7405] wife's in-law, and Zhang(1) Hui(1)'s [237] friend. Chunren was the affinal relation of Han(1) Zongdao [663], Wang(2) Yi(5) [7377] and Wang(2) Gu [1840]. Fan Chunren, WJ, 'fu,' 18.6a, 'bu,' 7b, 30b; XCB, 203.12b, 205.5b, 218.11b, 413.11a-14b; XCBSB, 5.12b (n.); Bi Zhongyou, WJ, 14.8a-11a (wife, surname Wang, who died in 1098 at age 64); SS, 314.16a-17a; Zeng Zhao, WJ, 4.12a; Wujun zhi, 26.2b; YLDD, 2368.3b. CBD, 2, 1666-1668.

desc.label: 與人交 終身無怨仇 范純仁、蘇頌皆稱之為國器 有文集三十卷
仲淹次子 皇祐元年進士 嘗從胡瑗、孫復學 父歿始出仕 知襄城縣
零陵人 隨父至永州 受學於范純仁 後遊張俊之門 及紹興末
歷晉原令 累官知梓州 熙寧末范純仁帥環慶 時有訟純仁不法者 詔繫寧州
徽宗即位時為中使 向太后權同聽政 將復用范純仁 而意若未伸 乃遣克明至永州
元符初詔求直言 九上書言宣仁太后之誣及司馬光之枉 乞用范純仁、蘇軾、蘇軾 斥退章惇、蔡卞、呂惠卿、蔡京 改提舉河北路常平
